name: Clean Sweep
description:
Ted Small and Antonio Lepore set out to make a game in one week, this is the result. The project was started on January 20th 2020 and completed January 26Th, enjoy!

Theme: Corruption

Concept: you are a part of an anti-virus program coursing through a circuit board, you must disinfect your patrol route by finding out which components are corrupted and solving the puzzle.

Product Info: 3D, Puzzler, Unity, dialogue/ interaction system.

Outline: Point and click navigation to the three nodes, you need to “hack” (simon like repeat the pattern musical puzzle) to progress through to the end of the level. Solve the puzzle and save the motherboard!
